title: GenericExcitationSource
description: The GenericExcitationSource element is used to represent a source as a collection of key/value pairs, stored in a Map. The other lightsource objects should always be used in preference to this if possible.

Name.description: A user defined name for this component.

ID.description: A LightSource ID must be specified for each light source, and the individual light sources can be referred to by their LightSource IDs (eg from Channel).

NominalPower.description: The nominal power of the light-source

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of this component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of this component

SpecsFile.description: Provide the location of a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: The AnnotationRef element is a reference to an element derived from the CommentAnnotation element, which consists of a simple comment multi-line annotation.

Map.description: This is a Mapping of key/value pairs used to store customized metadata that describes this element.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
